definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: People who train with clickers or markers and never correct a dog also fall into this category.
sentences.chinese: 响片训练者从不使用纠正，也属于这类人。

sentences.english: The trainer appeared, followed by six little dogs.
sentences.chinese: 训练者出现了，后面跟着六条小狗。

sentences.english: Clicker purists will disagree with using luring.
sentences.chinese: 纯粹的响片训练者不同意使用诱导。

sentences.english: The third category of dog trainer is the where I strive to be.
sentences.chinese: 第三类训练者是我正努力达到的目标。

sentences.english: The cat suddenly turned on its trainer.
sentences.chinese: 这只猫突然转而进攻它的训练者。

sentences.english: Persons receiving vocational training in vocational training institutes registered with the government;
sentences.chinese: 六在政府登记有案之职业训练机构接受训练者。

definition: triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)
